00046 Button::Button(Gui * gui, int cx, int cy, int w, int h, char * string, char * tag)
00047 {
00048         this->gui = gui;
00049         this->x = cx - w/2;
00050         this->y = cy - h/2;
00051         this->width = w;
00052         this->height = h;
00053         this->tag = (tag) ? strdup(tag) : gen_button_tag();
00054         this->string = (string) ? strdup(string) : strdup("[button]");
00055 }

00071 void Button::Draw_Centre(int x, int y, bool selected)
00072 {
00073         ALLEGRO_COLOR green = al_map_rgba_f(0, 0.5, 0, 1);
00074         ALLEGRO_COLOR bright = al_map_rgba_f(0.25, 0.75, 0.25, 1);
00075         ALLEGRO_FONT* font = gui->Get_font();
00076 
00077         al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, (selected) ? bright : green );
00078         al_draw_rectangle(this->x, this->y, this->x + this->width, this->y + this->height, al_map_rgb(100, 0, 0), 0);
00079         al_font_textout_centre(font,  this->x + this->width/2, this->y + this->height/2, this->string, -1);
00080 }
